# useISOCurrencySymbol

**Instance Property**

A boolean value that sets the system UI’s currency symbol to ISO 4217 three-letter code.

## Declaration

```swift
var useISOCurrencySymbol: Bool
```

## Discussion

The default value  is `false`.
title: useISOCurrencySymbol
